translation.en: Why were you suicidal?

translation.ja: それは… 高い理想があるのに―

translation.en: but I can go so deep that I don't see a way out.
translation.ja: うまくいかなくて 思いどおりにできない

translation.en: - Yes. - And I am looking for a way to...

translation.en: to get out of my body or to hate myself or to--
translation.ja: 自分を傷つけようと したりしたけど…

translation.en: I can explain the deep and I don't find a way out.
translation.ja: どうしていいか 分からなくて

translation.en: - What? - Is it the red shoes?

translation.en: - No. - Okay.
translation.ja: いや

translation.en: If you smile like that too much, you'll wanna stick around.

translation.ja: 自分を追い詰めるな

translation.en: But those aren't high standards. That's called perfection.

translation.en: And most people overestimate what they can do in a year,

translation.en: and they underestimate what they can do in two or three decades.
translation.ja: 20～30年でできることを 見ようとしない

translation.en: And you haven't been around long enough to have those extra two or three decades,

translation.en: so don't fuck it up. There's time.

translation.en: And if you give yourself just a little bit of time...

translation.en: and if you'll be a little more loving to yourself...

translation.en: I think you're gonna find you got a lot to give.

translation.en: I can fucking feel it.

translation.en: - That's right. - Thank you.

translation.en: And I know you right now.

translation.en: - Can you feel me? - Yes, I do.

translation.en: So, you and I are gonna make a deal.
translation.ja: じゃあ 約束しよう

translation.en: I'm gonna show you what to do to reshape yourself.
translation.ja: 君に自己改革の道を説こう

translation.en: That would be nice.
translation.ja: よかった

translation.en: And we're gonna make it so you could enjoy yourself.
translation.ja: 自分自身を楽しめるように

translation.en: Oh, are you sure?
translation.ja: 本当に？

translation.en: Not just when you're jerking off, other times, too.
translation.ja: マスをかいてる時以外も

translation.en: Yeah. How's that?
translation.ja: いい笑顔だ　その調子

translation.en: And what you're gonna do
translation.ja: だが条件がある

translation.en: is you're gonna remember as long as you live...
translation.ja: これだけは覚えておいてくれ

translation.en: that I don't fucking bullshit. And you've seen it, haven't you?
translation.ja: 僕はウソをつかない 知ってるだろ？

translation.en: Do I tell the fucking truth?
translation.ja: 僕は真実を言う

translation.en: Even when it's painful? Even when it's not sweet?
translation.ja: つらく 厳しいことであってもだ

translation.en: I'm telling you the truth.
translation.ja: じゃあ 言おう

translation.en: You've just fucking begun and you're not gonna fuck it up.
translation.ja: 君は人生を棒に振らない

translation.en: You're gonna take the time to fully develop
translation.ja: 時間をかけて自分を磨き―

translation.en: and you're gonna find a way to enjoy a little bit along the way.
translation.ja: その過程を 楽しむことさえできる

translation.en: - - There you go. - Did you feel that? - Yes.
translation.ja: どうだい　感じたか？

translation.en: What was that, that just happened?

translation.en: What just happened there when these came down like that? And you started breathing here, too.
translation.ja: 肩の力が抜けたし 呼吸も楽になっただろ

translation.en: Um, start believing you and be open.
translation.ja: あなたの言葉で解放された

translation.en: Oh...  That's it.
translation.ja: よし

translation.en: I'm a kid from Azusa, California, who did not have any fucking certainty,
translation.ja: 子供の頃の僕には 確固たるものがなかったが

translation.en: but I was certain of one thing.
translation.ja: ひとつだけ決めてた

translation.en: I was not about to grow up and have a family that was gonna go through what I went through.
translation.ja: 家族を自分と同じ目に 遭わせないということ

translation.en: And so, I constructed this fucking Tony Robbins guy.
translation.ja: それで“アンソニー”という 人間を作った

translation.en: I constructed him. I created him. He was me but I built this motherfucker.
translation.ja: 彼は僕自身だが 僕が創造したクソ野郎なんだ

translation.en: Our next guest is a number one bestselling author
translation.ja: 著書やセミナーを 通じて―

translation.en: whose books and seminars have helped inspire more than 50 million people to transform their lives.
translation.ja: ５千万人もの人生を 変革させた人物です

translation.en: He's perhaps best known for his three decades of work in the field of self- improvement.
translation.ja: 30年に及ぶ自己啓発活動で 知られています

translation.en: More than four million people around the world have attended one of his live events.
translation.ja: セミナー参加者は世界中で 400万人を超えます

translation.en: I was looking at the list of people that you have helped.
translation.ja: あなたのクライアントは―

translation.en: Bill Clinton, Princess Diana, Mikhail Gorbachev, Mother Teresa, Nelson Mandela.
translation.ja: 前大統領 ダイアナ妃 マザー･テレサなど…

translation.en: These are, like, the icons of my lifetime.
translation.ja: そうそうたる面々です

translation.en: I would do these incantations where I would say over and over again,

translation.en: I'm fucking unstoppable. I'm fucking-- And I would just...
translation.ja: “決して止まるもんか”

translation.en: I would say that for an hour while I would go on a run.
translation.ja: 走ってる間 唱え続ける

translation.en: Till pretty soon, after days of that shit, what do you think was in my head?
translation.ja: 何日も続けると 頭の中はどうなる？

translation.en: Everyone needs a compelling future.
translation.ja: 人には目標が必要です 人には目標が必要です 〝ワース誌が選ぶ パワフルな１００人〞

translation.en: Everyone needs something to move towards.
translation.ja: 人には目標が必要です 〝ワース誌が選ぶ パワフルな１００人〞 〝ワース誌が選ぶ パワフルな１００人〞

translation.en: If you don't have something to move towards, you settle for where things are.

translation.en: I would get up and I had no money.
translation.ja: 朝起きて無一文になってたら

translation.en: Then I'd say, God's wealth is circulating in my life.
translation.ja: 朝起きて無一文になってたら “僕の人生は神の富で 満ちあふれてる”って言う

translation.en: His wealth flows to me in avalanches of abundance.

translation.en: All my needs, desires, and goals are met instantaneously by infinite intelligence,

translation.en: for I am one with God, and God is everything.

translation.en: Then I'd see God's wealth in the love, in the friendships,

translation.en: in the insights, in the ideas, in the emotion,
translation.ja: 神の富とは愛 友情 物事の本質を見る力 思想 感情 魂なんだ

translation.en: in the fucking energy in my body and my soul,

translation.en: in my hunger and my desire to breakthrough and make things happen. I didn't just say the fucking words.
translation.ja: 壁を打ち破り 何かを 成し遂げようとする欲望だ

translation.en: Every day, work harder on yourself than anything else.
translation.ja: 知識や技術を磨けば―

translation.en: 'Cause if you become more intelligent, more valuable, more skilled,
translation.ja: 他の人にとって 価値ある人間になれます 他の人にとって 価値ある人間になれます 〝アンソニーが 授かった助言〞

translation.en: you can add more value to other people.
translation.ja: 他の人にとって 価値ある人間になれます 〝アンソニーが 授かった助言〞

translation.en: I realized if I'm gonna get to my ultimate destiny, I gotta be smarter.
translation.ja: 運命を知るには 賢くならないといけない

translation.en: Who am I ultimately wanting to become or what is the destiny I'm here for?

translation.en: So, I created this thing called Date With Destiny.

translation.en: If I could uncover what beliefs and values control me, I could literally redesign me.

translation.en: I created this motherfucker standing here.

translation.en: Three, two, one, go.
What's the best way for us to interact with you?

translation.ja: 彼はあちこち移動する ビデオ･ディレクター ジョン･ターベット ビデオ･ディレクター ジョン･ターベット ビデオ･ディレクター ジョン･ターベット 正面にいる時は ４台でカバーできる

translation.en: And I'm glad you're just coming on the journey to check it out.

translation.en: I use the intervention - to teach principles in the middle of it. - 100%.

translation.en: I love that. That's my favorite way to do it.

translation.en: That allows me to then circle back and I'll have them

translation.ja: 参加者たち自身の人生を 考えさせる そうすれば個人の発言が増え やりやすくなるんだ

translation.en: - Yep. - And that'll open up some shares. And that'll open up some more interventions, and we'll be rockin' and rollin'.

translation.en: We're super excited to have you! There are quite a few of you, as you might see.

translation.en: If I could get everyone who's here to please stand up, so we can unblock our exits, get excited.

translation.en: - It's 11:00 now. - It's 11:00 even?

translation.en: So, I can do...  Yeah, I can do ten minutes and stop on time.
translation.ja: じゃあ まだ時間はあるな

translation.en: Fifty- seven degrees, baby. Whoa!

translation.ja: 大勢が11時半から 会場にいるので―

translation.en: Timing it so that he walks out and it's just an utter buildup of energy is just so important for him.

translation.en: He gets there, walks up on stage, and just everyone's at a peak.

translation.ja: スケジュールを メアリーの要望で―

translation.en: - Okay, cool. - Yeah.
translation.ja: ありがとう

translation.en: - Twenty- five minutes. - Perfect.
translation.ja: 25分ですね よし

translation.en: What is Date With Destiny from your perspective?
translation.ja: “デート･ウィズ･ デスティニー”とは？

translation.en: From my perspective,
translation.ja: 人生における 今という段階で―

translation.en: it's a place that you go to uncover who you really are
translation.ja: 人生における 今という段階で― 真の自分を発掘する場所だと 思ってるよ

translation.en: and what you're really about at this stage of your life.
translation.ja: 真の自分を発掘する場所だと 思ってるよ

translation.en: Who is this program right for?  Anybody who's hungry.
translation.ja: どんな人が対象ですか？ 飢えてる人 現状に不満な人だ

translation.en: Anybody who's looking for more.
translation.ja: 飢えてる人 現状に不満な人だ

translation.en: If you're not hungry, it's the absolute wrong program for you. Don't even think about coming. You get eaten alive in this environment.
translation.ja: 満足してる人は 来ても圧倒されるだけさ

translation.en: But for somebody that's hungry...  I got an experience for you, baby.
translation.ja: 飢えてる人には 最高の体験をしてもらう

translation.en: I'm bringing a mirror. I'm bringing crazy tools.
translation.ja: 驚くような道具も使う

translation.en: I mean, I'll be off the charts. I'll be weird. I'll be bizarre. I'll seem gross.
translation.ja: 常識にとらわれず 悪趣味なことも

translation.en: I'll use the science of taboo language
translation.ja: タブーとされる言葉も使う

translation.en: because words have the power to pierce the conscious mind.
translation.ja: 意識の壁を 破る力があるからね

translation.en: Look, I'll do whatever the eff it takes to break the pattern,
translation.ja: 殻を破り 真の自分を取り戻せるなら

translation.en: so you can reclaim who you really are.
translation.ja: どんなことでもやる

translation.en: Welcome to the stage, Mr. Anthony Robbins!
translation.ja: アンソニー･ロビンズの 登場です！

translation.en: Come on, guys! Come on!
translation.ja: もっと熱狂しろ！

translation.en: Come on!
translation.ja: さあ もっと！

translation.en: How're you doing out there, ladies and gentlemen?
translation.ja: みんな調子はどうだ？

translation.en: Welcome to Date With Destiny 2014, and for some of you, welcome home.
translation.ja: “デート･ウィズ･ デスティニー”へようこそ

translation.en: Good to see you.
translation.ja: よく来てくれた

translation.en: Start your morning-- It's afternoon now, with 12 good morning high- fives, hugs.
translation.ja: 12時過ぎだけど １日の始まりだ ハグとハイタッチで 周りに自己紹介を

translation.en: Go for it. Introduce yourselves. Connect.
translation.ja: ハグとハイタッチで 周りに自己紹介を

translation.en: All right, grab a seat.
translation.ja: よし　席に着いて

translation.en: Thank you for the warm welcome. What have you gotten yourself into?
translation.ja: 歓迎ありがとう みんな大丈夫か？

translation.en: I wanna welcome you here. First of all, this is my favorite program.
translation.ja: 本当にようこそ 今回が25年間で―

translation.en: This is my 74th Date With Destiny in 25 years. It's been amazing.
translation.ja: 74回目の“デート･ウィズ･ デスティニー”だ

translation.en: And over those decades, doing this, literally, all around the world
translation.ja: セミナーの開催は 世界の各地域に及び―

translation.en: in virtually every major country. I've had people from more than 100 countries attend this program.
translation.ja: 100を超える国から 参加者が集まってくれた

translation.en: Uh, what I can tell you right now is this program is different than any other program.
translation.ja: このセミナーは 他とは一線を画するものだ

translation.en: And what's different about this program is not only the depth of what we're gonna go to.
translation.ja: 単に問題を 深く掘り下げるだけではない

translation.en: We're gonna get to take a look at the force that controls
translation.ja: 単に問題を 深く掘り下げるだけではない 思考や感覚や感情を 支配する力を見つめる

translation.en: every thought, every feeling and every emotion of your life.
translation.ja: 思考や感覚や感情を 支配する力を見つめる

translation.en: The beliefs, values, and rules
translation.ja: 信念や価値観や規則が―

translation.en: that literally control the way you think, feel, and behave.
translation.ja: 考え方や行動を支配する

translation.en: We are gonna get emotionally fit because life is gonna come at you.
translation.ja: 感情のぜい肉を落とすんだ

translation.en: This is not some bullshit positive- thinking seminar
translation.ja: ポジティブ思考セミナーとは 別物だ

translation.en: where I'm gonna tell you to start chanting,
translation.ja: ポジティブ思考セミナーとは 別物だ “雑草は生えない”と唱えて 願ってるだけとは違う

translation.en: There's no weeds, there's no weeds, and hope shit isn't there.
translation.ja: “雑草は生えない”と唱えて 願ってるだけとは違う

translation.en: This is a place where you and I prepare for anything. We look for the weed and we rip it out.
translation.ja: ここでは立ち向かい 雑草を見つけてむしり取る

translation.en: Over the next six days and nights, we're gonna get to the source of what controls it all,
translation.ja: 支配の根源に迫り それを変える

translation.en: then you're gonna change it. And you're not going to do it the way I tell you to. Who the hell am I? I'm not your guru.
translation.ja: 変えるのは君たち自身だ 君たちが運命を変える

translation.en: I didn't come here to fix you 'cause you're not broken, and I know that.
translation.ja: 君たちを治すわけじゃない

translation.en: Even if you think you're broken, I'm here to tell you and show you you're not.
translation.ja: そもそも君たちは壊れてない

translation.en: What I want you to know is if you're gonna have a breakthrough,
translation.ja: 闇を抜け出すのに―

translation.en: when someone says, It took ten years to make a change,
translation.ja: 10年かかったと 言う人もいる

translation.en: what you really find out is that change happened in a moment.
translation.ja: だが変革は一瞬のことだ

translation.en: It took you ten years to get to the moment where you finally said,

そして…

Oh, give me a break. You could take another 30 years of this shit.

translation.ja: 強化するか変化させるんだ

translation.en: The way we're gonna do this
translation.ja: 君たちが抱いてる―

translation.en: is you're gonna write down your primary question.
translation.ja: 一番の疑問を書き出してくれ

translation.en: Everyone has a question you ask more often than anything else on Earth, and here's why that's so important.
translation.ja: 誰でも疑問を抱くものだし それが重要なんだ

translation.en: Questions control what you focus on.
translation.ja: 疑問によって 大事なことが分かる

translation.en: What you focus on is what you feel. What you feel is your experience of life.
translation.ja: 気持ちも左右され 人生が決定づけられる

translation.en: And then you'll write down your mission statement.
translation.ja: 次に自分の使命を書いて

translation.en: It's something really simple.
translation.ja: 難しくはない

translation.en: It's gonna be one core sentence
translation.ja: 君という人間の核になる １文でいい

translation.en: that's designed to be a trigger for all that you are.
translation.ja: 自分を 後押ししてくれる文章だ

translation.en: But you could write 20 pages and it wouldn't be all you are.
translation.ja: 長々と書く必要はない シンプルでいい

translation.en: We want one phrase that's gonna be really
translation.ja: 長々と書く必要はない シンプルでいい ここで何を経験し 何を与えようとしたのか

translation.en: what you're here to experience and what you're here to give,
translation.ja: ここで何を経験し 何を与えようとしたのか

translation.en: what you're here to be and what you're here to do.
translation.ja: どうなりたくて 何ができるか 〝新しい価値観や規則を 思い描く〞

translation.en: And then when you're done with that,
translation.ja: それができたら ポスターに次の事柄を書く

translation.en: you're gonna make a poster that has these distinctions.
translation.ja: それができたら ポスターに次の事柄を書く それができたら ポスターに次の事柄を書く 〝現状の価値観や規則を 見直す〞

translation.en: You're gonna write your mission statement across the top.
translation.ja: 一番上には使命

translation.en: Below, you're gonna write your new primary question.
translation.ja: その下に新しい疑問を書く

translation.en: You're gonna do your top four, one- year goals.
translation.ja: それから４つの目標

translation.en: And if you have a relationship vision you like, you can add that in the bottom corner.
translation.ja: パートナーとの ビジョンもあれば下に書いて

translation.en: Why are we doing this? These are some of the most important decisions we've made over the last five days together.
translation.ja: これらが この５日間 一緒に考えてきたことだ

translation.en: Decisions you're gonna make tonight.
translation.ja: 今夜 君たちは決断を下す

translation.en: They're why you came here.
translation.ja: そのために来たんだ

translation.en: And the decisions you're gonna make tonight are gonna touch you and everyone you love.
translation.ja: 愛する人にも 影響を与える決断だ

translation.en: We get to decide tonight, What are you made for at this next stage of your life?
translation.ja: 君たちの人生の次の段階で 何をするか―

translation.en: What are you gonna give? What are you gonna become? What are you gonna do? What are you gonna feel?
translation.ja: 何を与え 何を感じるか 今夜 決断するんだ

translation.en: Now is the time for us all to step up.
translation.ja: 今がステップアップの時だ

translation.en: This next stage is a day you'll remember as long as you live.
translation.ja: これから起きることを 生涯 忘れないだろう

translation.en: It'll be a new birthday for some of you. A birth you created.
translation.ja: 生まれ変わる人も いるかもしれない

translation.en: A birth of new values, a new life, and a new direction.
translation.ja: 自分自身で作り出す 新たな人生の誕生だ

translation.en: So let's step up and make it happen now.
translation.ja: さあ 実現させよう

translation.en: It may be my own bias, but I really don't believe
translation.ja: 僕が思うに― 今のままでいても 人生は満たされない

translation.en: people really feel fulfilled staying where they are.
translation.ja: 今のままでいても 人生は満たされない

translation.en: And the reason is life is growth.
translation.ja: 成長するのが人生だ

translation.en: I don't care who it is. Maybe for a period of time, it's nice to have a respite and go, I kind of like being here.
translation.ja: たまには休むのも悪くない 動きたくない時もある

translation.en: I don't wanna go after something new. Let me breathe and take it in.
translation.ja: 新しいことが 面倒な場合もある

translation.en: But if you sit at the table of success too long, you're gonna get bored.
translation.ja: でも長く快適な場所にいると 退屈する

translation.en: Progress equals happiness. If you're growing in anything,
translation.ja: 進歩することが幸せなんだ

translation.en: financially, spiritually, emotionally, in your relationship, in your body,
translation.ja: 金銭面も精神面も 人間関係も―

translation.en: you're gonna feel better in your life. That's what we're made for. And I think we're meant to grow so we have something to give.
translation.ja: 改善できれば幸せだし 人にも与えることができる

translation.en: You know, you can't give something you really don't have.
translation.ja: 自分が持たないと 人に与えられない

translation.en: On the very first day, I just asked people, What is an extraordinary life for you?
translation.ja: いつも初日に 理想の人生を聞いて―

translation.en: I want them to identify what's life on their terms.
translation.ja: 求めるものを確認させる

translation.en: Is that building a garden or writing poetry?
translation.ja: ガーデニングでも 詩を書くことでもいい

translation.en: Then do that and feel it, right? Really, don't settle.
translation.ja: ガーデニングでも 詩を書くことでもいい 他のことに気を散らさず 没頭するんだ

translation.en: Don't get caught up in the other pieces there.
translation.ja: 他のことに気を散らさず 没頭するんだ

translation.en: Or is there a dream that you just give up on that you're gonna pour yourself back into just so you feel more alive?
translation.ja: 断念した夢にまた挑戦して 生きがいを感じてもいい

translation.en: I'm a big believer that's it's growth, but there are so many paths,
translation.ja: 理想の実現の鍵は 成長だと思うが―

translation.en: and I don't have the delusion
translation.ja: 理想の実現の鍵は 成長だと思うが― 方法はいくらでもある

translation.en: that mine is the best or the only or the right path or anything like that.
translation.ja: 方法はいくらでもある 僕のやり方が唯一じゃない

translation.en: I'm just a path for somebody who wants to try something new
translation.ja: 新しいことを始める人の ひとつの道だ

translation.en: and say, I'm gonna look at humanity through different eyes. I'm gonna see myself through different eyes,
translation.ja: 今までと違う目で 他人や自分を見てみたら―

translation.en: and maybe feel a level of energy I've not felt in decades, years, or ever.
translation.ja: 新たなエネルギーを 感じられるかもしれない

translation.en: And then I'm gonna take that and go rip my life open to a new level. That's who I'm for.
translation.ja: そうすれば人生を 新たなレベルに上げられる

translation.en: Come on, everybody.
translation.ja: “人は成長するもの だから人に与えられる” 皆さん どうぞ

translation.en: Doors are open. We gotta get going.
translation.ja: 開場してますよ

translation.en: Day six, Date With Destiny. The party's getting ready to start.
translation.ja: ６日目 パーティーの始まりだ

translation.en: The best stuff is getting ready to happen. You don't wanna miss it. Come on.
translation.ja: いいところを見逃しますよ 急いで

translation.en: Today, we're gonna take every single thing, every major decision we've made this week,
translation.ja: 今週 君たちが下した すべての重要な決断を―

translation.en: and we're gonna take it through a process
translation.ja: 〝使命〞 あるプロセスにかける あるプロセスにかける

translation.en: that's gonna take it from being as thoughts or ideas or concepts
translation.ja: その考えやコンセプトを 体に落とし込む

translation.en: - into your body. - Doors are open!
translation.ja: その考えやコンセプトを 体に落とし込む 開場してますよ みんな中に入って

translation.en: Come on back. Come on back, everybody.
translation.ja: 開場してますよ みんな中に入って

translation.en: Come on.
translation.ja: 急いで

translation.en: How do we make sure this continues and doesn't end here?
translation.ja: どうすれば継続させられる？ 〝勝利は近い〞

translation.en: I'll tell you the secret.
translation.ja: 〝勝利は近い〞 一度のセミナーで 人生のすべては解決しない

translation.en: I didn't go to an event one time in my life and then I was fit for life.
translation.ja: 一度のセミナーで 人生のすべては解決しない

translation.en: So you have to have a daily practice.
translation.ja: 大事なのは日々の実践だ

translation.en: The training never stops.
translation.ja: 訓練は永遠に終わらない

translation.en: You need a system. - How many agree? Say aye. - Aye!
translation.ja: システムが必要だ 分かる人は“アイ”

translation.en: Make that system work, it'll make it happen.
translation.ja: 機能させて実現する

translation.en: So now, we are gonna take that poster of yours
translation.ja: 機能させて実現する ポスターはできたね？

translation.en: that has your mission statement, your values,
translation.ja: 使命などを 書いてもらったが―

translation.en: and we're gonna take it and get it, the core of it, in our nervous system.
translation.ja: それを神経系統に取り込む

translation.en: And we're gonna do it this way.
translation.ja: まずは４人のグループを作る

translation.en: You're gonna get with four people, and this group's goal
translation.ja: まずは４人のグループを作る 今日のセミナーの目標は 決断したことをまとめ―

translation.en: is to help you to integrate completely everything you've committed to here,
translation.ja: 今日のセミナーの目標は 決断したことをまとめ―

translation.en: to own it in your nervous system, one million percent.
translation.ja: 神経に浸透させること

translation.en: You're gonna get up there and say,
translation.ja: 立ち上がって― “私は揺るがない！”と 全身で感じたことを発表する

translation.en: I, your name, see, hear, feel and know that I am decisive! Whatever the fuck it is, right?
translation.ja: “私は揺るがない！”と 全身で感じたことを発表する

translation.en: You're either gonna get it, you go, Yes!
translation.ja: 信じられたら“イエス！”

translation.en: If there's any ounce of it that's not there, you say nothing.
translation.ja: そうでなければ何も言わない

translation.en: You're gonna have to use all your sensory acuity, your awareness, be with this person. And you're gonna have to feel, do they completely own,
translation.ja: 聞く人は神経を集中させて 魂から発せられた真実なのか

translation.en: in every ounce of their soul, what they just said?
translation.ja: 判断しないといけない

translation.en: I wanna warn you about something.
translation.ja: 忠告しておく

translation.en: In this room, it's gonna be incredibly loud.
translation.ja: 会場は とてもうるさくなる

translation.en: I want you to have to fight to hear.
translation.ja: 聞こうとしないと聞こえない

translation.en: I want you to have to have everything else trying to distract you and you having to zero in on this one person,
translation.ja: 話し手だけに集中して その魂を感じるんだ

translation.en: feeling them with every possible distraction.
translation.ja: 話し手だけに集中して その魂を感じるんだ 余計なものは全部 遮断しろ そこに力を注いで

translation.en: That's a muscle we all want, right?
translation.ja: 余計なものは全部 遮断しろ そこに力を注いで

translation.en: Get your groups of four right now. Go.
translation.ja: グループを作って 始めて

translation.en: I, Ryan, see, hear, feel and know that I am bold.
translation.ja: 僕はライアン 勇敢な人間だと全身で感じる

translation.en: I, Dawn,
translation.ja: 私はドーン 目や耳や全身で感じて分かる

translation.en: see, hear, feel and know that I am love.
translation.ja: 私はドーン 目や耳や全身で感じて分かる 私自身が愛なの

translation.en: - What do I need, guys? Help me. - You were good.
translation.ja: 何が足りない？

translation.en: When you say love, you're not love.
translation.ja: 心を込めて“愛”と言うんだ

translation.en: Your love goes deep, very deep inside of you,
translation.ja: 心を込めて“愛”と言うんだ 君の愛は もっとずっと深い

translation.en: real deep, very deep, very, very, very fucking deep!
translation.ja: 君の愛は もっとずっと深い とても深いんだ どこまでも果てしなく深い

translation.en: It's not deep. It's very fucking deep, right?
translation.ja: とても深いんだ どこまでも果てしなく深い

translation.en: - Okay. - Okay.
translation.ja: だろ？ 分かった

translation.en: This is the point that we've been working for
translation.ja: セミナーの集大成だ

translation.en: where you actually redesign what you do with your life.
translation.ja: ここで 人生を どう生きるか再設計する

translation.en: When you guys change your values, one of the most wild things is some of you are gonna see things you've never seen before.
translation.ja: 価値観を変えると 見えなかったものが見えて

translation.en: Notice things you've never noticed, feel things you've not felt before.
translation.ja: 気づかなかったことに 気づける

translation.en: Because the priorities of your nervous system,
translation.ja: 神経系統の 優先事項が変わるんだ

translation.en: - literally, will change. - All right.
translation.ja: 神経系統の 優先事項が変わるんだ 僕はデレク 情熱の塊だと全身で感じてる

translation.en: I, Derek, see, hear, feel and know that I am passion!
translation.ja: 僕はデレク 情熱の塊だと全身で感じてる

translation.en: - I get that shit. - I didn't feel it. That was a lie.
translation.ja: ウソっぽい

translation.en: I think destiny is two things. It's who you're gonna become, and what're you gonna give in this life.
translation.ja: 自分がどうなって 何を与えるかで運命は決まる

translation.en: If you don't step up and be that person, she's never gonna find him.
translation.ja: 君がステップアップしないと 彼女に伝わらない

translation.en: - Fuck that! - You're the one
translation.ja: わかってる！ 決まった型を…

translation.en: - that's gonna break the pattern. - Fuck that!
translation.ja: やってやる！

translation.en: - You're gonna break the pattern. - Now!
translation.ja: 君が変える やるぜ！

translation.en: See, most people are so busy surviving, making a living,
translation.ja: 多くの人は 自分の生活に追われ―

translation.en: they never design a life.
translation.ja: 人生の設計をしない

translation.en: And if you don't take the time to design it, which is what we're doing here, you're gonna miss out.
translation.ja: でも それをしないと チャンスを逃す

translation.en: I'm enough! I have always been enough! - I will always be enough! - Yeah.
translation.ja: 私はこれまでも十分 これからも十分なの！

translation.en: I know that you're enough! As you are, you are enough! How will this change your life forever?
translation.ja: だったら どうやって 人生を変える？

translation.en: You'll snap your fingers, and ten years will happen.
translation.ja: 10年なんて あっという間だ

translation.en: You'll look back and go, Where did it go?
translation.ja: 一瞬だが 確実に たどり着く未来だ

translation.en: Ten years from now, we will surely arrive. The question is, Where?
translation.ja: 一瞬だが 確実に たどり着く未来だ では どこに着く？

translation.en: I, Brax, see, hear, feel and know...
translation.ja: 私はブラックス　全身で…

translation.en: ...that I am love, I am strength, I am wise, and I am passion!
translation.ja: 僕は愛　僕は力　僕は賢者 僕は情熱だ！ イエス！

translation.en: Anchor that into your body right now, ladies and gentlemen.
translation.ja: 自分の体に定着させるんだ

translation.en: Yeah!
translation.ja: 〈私は愛！ すばらしい愛！〉

translation.en: What was the breakthrough moment for you where you really understood that this was going to be your mission in life?
translation.ja: これが使命だと 気づいた瞬間はいつですか？

translation.en: I don't know if there's-- You know, everybody wants to think of a moment. I think life is many stacking moments like that.
translation.ja: “ある瞬間”じゃない 人生は瞬間の積み重ねだ

translation.en: I don't think it's one moment where suddenly you have this breakthrough.
translation.ja: 突然 何かに 気づいたりしない

translation.en: I mean, it can happen that way. I'm sure there are--
translation.ja: 突然 何かに 気づいたりしない 波乱万丈の人生だったし １つではないね

translation.en: At times, it seems like that. But I've had a pretty full life so I don't know if there's one.
translation.ja: 波乱万丈の人生だったし １つではないね

translation.en: I do know that when I was a sophomore in high school, I had a forensics speech class,
translation.ja: きっかけは高校２年の スピーチの授業だ

translation.en: and in that class, I was in love with the senior high school song leader,
translation.ja: そこで男子生徒の 憧れだった― 女子に恋をした

translation.en: like every boy was.
translation.ja: 女子に恋をした

translation.en: And I was somewhat humorous, and so I would crack her up.
translation.ja: 彼女の気を引こうと 笑わせてたんだけど―

translation.en: I could make her laugh. I got a lot of attention.
translation.ja: 彼女の気を引こうと 笑わせてたんだけど― クラス全体の 注目を浴びたんだ

translation.en: And I would do this where I'd take over the whole class.
translation.ja: クラス全体の 注目を浴びたんだ きれいに分かれてるな

translation.en: - It's like these two jury trials. -
translation.ja: きれいに分かれてるな

translation.en: Listen, since you're both in the room at the same time, let me just thank everybody.
translation.ja: 両方ともいるから お礼を言わせてほしい

translation.en: I gotta say, uh-- I don't know, some of you--
translation.ja: 両方ともいるから お礼を言わせてほしい 僕と10年以上 一緒にやってる人は？

translation.en: Who's been with me more than ten years of these events?
translation.ja: 僕と10年以上 一緒にやってる人は？

translation.en: Look at this! Wow!
translation.ja: すごい人数だ

translation.en: One day, the forensics speech teacher, Mr. Cobb, he said,
translation.ja: ある日 クラスのコブ先生に―

translation.en: Mr. Robbins, you'll remain after class.
translation.ja: “授業が終わったら残れ”と

translation.en: Pulls me aside after class.
translation.ja: 怒られると思ったら―

translation.en: And I'll never forget, I'm thinking, Oh, my God, I am so busted.
translation.ja: “なぜ残されたか 知ってるか？”と聞かれた

translation.en: And he said, You know why you're here? I said, Yes, I know why I'm here, sir.
translation.ja: “なぜ残されたか 知ってるか？”と聞かれた “知ってます”と言うと―

translation.en: And he said, No, you don't. I can tell you don't.
translation.ja: “知ってます”と言うと― “知らないだろ 私には分かる”

translation.en: He said, I know who you are.
translation.ja: “知らないだろ 私には分かる”

translation.en: I said, Excuse me?
translation.ja: 聞き返すと―

translation.en: He said, I know you want the girl's attention. That's not why you're here.
translation.ja: “女子の気を引いたことで 呼んだわけじゃない”

translation.en: It's pretty rare to be able to serve people in a state like this
translation.ja: すべてを懸けて 来てる人たちを―

translation.en: where they come and they are willing to put everything on the line
translation.ja: すべてを懸けて 来てる人たちを― 支援できる機会は めったにない

translation.en: and they're willing to open up.
translation.ja: 支援できる機会は めったにない

translation.en: And I can't thank all of you staff 'cause it doesn't matter what position you play,
translation.ja: スタッフみんなに お礼を言う

translation.en: you know, moving a chair makes a difference, bringing the water makes a difference. 'Cause when anything's missing, the whole thing falls apart.
translation.ja: どんな仕事内容も １つでも欠けたら成立しない

translation.en: He said, I have never seen anybody
translation.ja: “君のようにメモも見ずに スピーチをして―”

translation.en: who could just stand up and speak with no notes,
translation.ja: “君のようにメモも見ずに スピーチをして―” “聞く気のない生徒まで 虜(とりこ)にする男は初めて見た”

translation.en: look around at kids who won't listen
translation.ja: “聞く気のない生徒まで 虜(とりこ)にする男は初めて見た”

translation.en: and mesmerize them with just raw communication.
translation.ja: “聞く気のない生徒まで 虜(とりこ)にする男は初めて見た” “それこそスピーチでなく コミュニケーションだ”って

translation.en: He said, You're not a speaker. He said, You're a communicator.
translation.ja: “それこそスピーチでなく コミュニケーションだ”って

translation.en: And I was looking at him like he was crazy.
translation.ja: おかしな先生だと 思ったが―

translation.en: And he said, I know more about your life, Mr. Robbins, than you probably think I do or you think anybody does.
translation.ja: “私は君のことを 誰よりも分かってる”

translation.en: I know about your home life. I'm looking at him like, What?
translation.ja: “家庭のこともね” 僕が混乱してると―

translation.en: And he goes, I wanted you to read this. And he hands me this speech and it was called The Will to Win.
translation.ja: 「勝利への意志」という スピーチ原稿を渡された

translation.en: And he said, Just read it. If it's not your life, give it back to me and forget about it.
translation.ja: “読んでみてくれ 君のことが書かれてる”

translation.en: But if I've pegged you right, then that speech is you.
translation.ja: “君そのものだ”

translation.en: And I want you to go compete at this regional final in persuasive oratory.
translation.ja: “これで弁論大会の 地区予選に出てほしい”と

translation.en: To my leadership, it feels so incredible that I can go full force into that room
translation.ja: 僕は全体を 引っ張らなきゃいけないが

translation.en: and I know that there are gonna be some people that are gonna need that individual attention,
translation.ja: 個人的なケアが 必要な人もいる

translation.en: and that you guys will grab 'em and be on top of it,
translation.ja: それを的確にやってくれた

translation.en: and I think that's the gift of this community we've built here is we've raised the standard for caring.
translation.ja: 僕らが築き上げた コミュニティーの力だ

translation.en: And I read the speech and I cried my eyes out. And it was all about, um...
translation.ja: 原稿を読んで 涙が止まらなかった

translation.en: just never ever, ever, ever giving up.
translation.ja: 何があっても 諦めないという内容だ

translation.en: Just pure will is what keeps you going.
translation.ja: 前進あるのみという 強固な意志

translation.en: At that stage of my life, that's all it was, was pure will.
translation.ja: あの頃の僕には それが すべてだった

translation.en: And, um, so I read that thing. I said, This is me,
translation.ja: あの頃の僕には それが すべてだった 僕は そのスピーチを 自分のことだと思い―

translation.en: and I got up and I went to this regional competition,
translation.ja: 僕は そのスピーチを 自分のことだと思い―

translation.en: and I trounced everybody. I won first place.
translation.ja: 地区予選で優勝した

translation.en: And I went to another one, and I won first place, another one, first place.
translation.ja: その後も優勝の連続だった

translation.en: - Let's grab a picture right here. - It was a
translation.ja: 撮りますよ

translation.en: breakthrough because I began to realize I had a way I can reach people.
translation.ja: 人に影響を与えられると 気づいたんだ

translation.en: So, I'm deeply touched and I'm very grateful.
translation.ja: 感謝の気持ちでいっぱいだ

translation.en: Thank you for being my partners and creating another magnificent event
translation.ja: このイベントを 成功させてくれてありがとう

translation.en: that those human beings will never be the same again.
translation.ja: このイベントを 成功させてくれてありがとう 君たちは本当にすばらしい

translation.en: - Thank you so much. See you all back. - Thank you. Thank you.
translation.ja: ありがとう　また会おう

translation.en: Why is it still an emotional experience for you to even tell that story?
translation.ja: なぜ今でも その話に感動するのですか？

translation.en: Because I see that as a moment of grace.
translation.ja: 神の恵みだと思ってるから

translation.en: That man, you know, in my life, handing me that letter, seeing who I was in that moment, that was grace.
translation.ja: 彼が僕という人間を 見抜いたのも神の恵みだ

translation.en: There's a lot I've done, but that was grace.
translation.ja: 恵みのおかげだ

translation.en: Um, I didn't create that.
translation.ja: 僕の力ではない

translation.en: And so, while I've done my part to sculpt who I am, and I've done a hell of a lot about that to say the least,
translation.ja: 様々な努力をしてきたし その努力が終わることはない

translation.en: and it never ends for me. I also recognize  grace.
translation.ja: それだって神の恵みだと 思ってる

translation.en: So it's a connection to the divine,
translation.ja: 神と自分を結びつけるものだ

translation.en: a connection to know that it's more than you,
translation.ja: 神と自分を結びつけるものだ そう感じるのは 健全なことだろ

translation.en: and I think that's a healthy thing.
translation.ja: そう感じるのは 健全なことだろ

translation.en: Sometimes in life...
translation.ja: 生きてると 時に―

translation.en: we're wanting to make steps forward but there seems to be something pulling us back.
translation.ja: 自分は前へ進みたいのに 引き戻される感じがする

translation.en: The human consciousness is an interesting device
translation.ja: 人間の意識というものは とても面白い

translation.en: in that the brain is learning all the time.
translation.ja: 意識を生み出す脳は 常に学習してる

translation.en: And the brain's primary job is to make sure you survive,
translation.ja: 脳の一番の役割は 生命の維持で―

translation.en: so it's always looking what to protect you from.
translation.ja: 常に君たちを守ろうとする

translation.en: And very often in life, we have an experience,
translation.ja: よくあるのが ある経験をして―

translation.en: and we react to that experience. It's like a muscle contracting.
translation.ja: 筋肉の収縮みたいに その経験に反応する

translation.en: But then we keep it contracted. We never, once it's safe, let go again.
translation.ja: だけど収縮し続けてると 元に戻らない

translation.en: And it limits what we can experience in our life.
translation.ja: 先の行動が制限される

translation.en: Freud figured out that if we could go back to before the moment,
translation.ja: フロイトは その状態の前へ戻れば―

translation.en: it could heal the moment that was holding you
translation.ja: 治癒できると考えた

translation.en: 'cause you'd forgotten something that would make you let go.
translation.ja: 解放する方法を 君たちは忘れてる

translation.en: So, I'm gonna take you through an experience of doing that
translation.ja: 回復のプロセスを 体験させよう

translation.en: and this process, you don't have to understand it.
translation.ja: 回復のプロセスを 体験させよう 理解する必要はない 身を委ねて

translation.en: This is a journey you're gonna go on.
translation.ja: 理解する必要はない 身を委ねて

translation.en: You'll remember certain things.
translation.ja: 過去の出来事を 思い出し―

translation.en: And as you remember them, you can make some new decisions about what they mean
translation.ja: 出来事の持つ意味を 新たに設定する

translation.en: and how it might mean a new life to you.
translation.ja: 人生に有意義な意味を

translation.en: I'm wondering what your earliest memory is.
translation.ja: 君たちの最初の記憶は？

translation.en: Where were you?
translation.ja: 場所は？

translation.en: What were you experiencing?
translation.ja: 何をしてた？

translation.en: What did it mean?
translation.ja: その意味は？

translation.en: What did you decide back then?
translation.ja: その時 何を決断した？

translation.en: It's a decision that affected the way you think about life.
translation.ja: それが人生観に影響してる

translation.en: Okay, now lights down, and we'll do our breath.
translation.ja: 照明を落とそう 息を止めて

translation.en: We're gonna rise up with our hands, but as you do it, you're taking the breath in.
translation.ja: 手を上に 息を吸いながら上げて

translation.en: Stop. Stop.
translation.ja: ストップ　やめて

translation.en: Hands relaxed. Palms face up, relaxed.
translation.ja: 手をリラックスさせ 手のひらを上に向ける

translation.en: Feel your body.
translation.ja: 体を感じて

translation.en: Feel how your breath has calmed your mind.
translation.ja: 呼吸が心に 安らぎをもたらすのを感じて

translation.en: With your eyes remaining closed,
translation.ja: 目を閉じたまま 両手を胸へ持っていく

translation.en: put both your hands on your heart and breathe deep into your heart.
translation.ja: 目を閉じたまま 両手を胸へ持っていく そして深く息を吸い込むんだ

translation.en: Breathe in your heart and feel the strength of your heart.
translation.ja: 深呼吸して 心臓の力を感じる

translation.en: Feel grateful for the gift of your heart.
translation.ja: 心臓の恵みに感謝しよう

translation.en: For as long as it beats, you live.
translation.ja: 鼓動が続く限り 生き続ける

translation.en: I want you to think of three moments in your life
translation.ja: ３つの瞬間を思い出して

translation.en: that you could feel deeply grateful for if you wanted to.
translation.ja: 心の底から ありがたいと思えた時だ

translation.en: Just go on a journey of one moment after the other of gratitude.
translation.ja: １つ１つ思い出したら 感謝の旅に出よう

translation.en: You may feel a hand touch your head.
translation.ja: 頭に手が触れるのを感じたら

translation.en: If it does, just keep in the state you're in and intensify.
translation.ja: 頭に手が触れるのを感じたら 今の状態を維持して さらに高める

translation.en: If it doesn't, you'll still feel the energy. It'll be in you.
translation.ja: 自らの中に湧く力を 感じられるだろう

translation.en: Really go for it. Step in the moment, like you're there, looking through your own eyes,
translation.ja: その時に戻って 見たものを見直す

translation.en: seeing what you saw then, feeling what you felt then, appreciating...
translation.ja: 感謝の気持ちで もう一度 感じるんだ

translation.en: Feeling the blessing of that moment.
translation.ja: 恵みを感じて―

translation.en: What a blessing it was in your life, how grateful you are.
translation.ja: そのすばらしさに感謝する

translation.en: Take in the gratitude of that moment.
translation.ja: 恵みに感謝しよう

translation.en: Feel it.
translation.ja: 感じるんだ

translation.en: Feel what it led to that you feel so grateful for.
translation.ja: 感謝の気持ちを もたらしたもの

translation.en: That it was a blessing.
translation.ja: それが恵みだ

translation.en: In a few moments, you'll open your eyes, feeling integrated, feeling strong...
translation.ja: 間もなく目を開ける 強さを内部に感じながら―

translation.en: feeling like a healing, feeling filled with gratitude,
translation.ja: 癒やしと感謝を心に抱く

translation.en: wanting to stretch, to strengthen and to feel fully alive,
translation.ja: 体を伸ばして 気持ちを強め― かつてないほどの 生きてる実感が湧く

translation.en: more than ever,
translation.ja: かつてないほどの 生きてる実感が湧く

translation.en: feeling at one with yourself and one with life.
translation.ja: 自分自身と命を感じながら

translation.en: Where an energy will come through you
translation.ja: 湧き上がってくる力を―

translation.en: and you can celebrate that with your voice in that moment.
translation.ja: 湧き上がってくる力を― 声を上げて祝福しよう

translation.en: Get ready.
translation.ja: 声を上げて祝福しよう

translation.en: Open your eyes whenever you're ready.
translation.ja: 準備ができたら目を開けて

translation.en: And when you want, you can stand...
translation.ja: 目を開けて立ち上がるんだ

translation.en: and you can begin to stretch,
translation.ja: 体を伸ばし―

translation.en: and you can feel the energy build inside you.
translation.ja: 内に湧き上がる力を感じよう

translation.en: Let it build.
translation.ja: 気持ちを高め　それから―

translation.en: And then make a sound of total joy, total excitement.
translation.ja: 気持ちを高め　それから― 喜びと興奮の声を上げる

translation.en: One, two, three, go!
Feel the guidance that never leaves us.
translation.ja: 永遠の導きの力を感じよう

translation.en: Take everything in here so you can take it home forever.
translation.ja: すべてを吸収し 自分のものにしよう

translation.en: Breathe it, feel it, own it, tonight and every night.
translation.ja: 呼吸し 感じ― 永遠に自分のものにする

translation.en: You take the greatest gifts of all home, who you've become,
translation.ja: 持ち帰る最大の恵みは 新たな自分

translation.en: the choices you've made,
translation.ja: 自ら下した決断

translation.en: the strength, the love, the commitment in your heart.
translation.ja: 強さと あふれ出る愛だ

translation.en: And the sound will always bring you back to this moment.
translation.ja: この瞬間を 永遠に刻み込む音を―

translation.en: One, two, three! Make the sound of who you are!
translation.ja: １… ２ ３ 自分を奏でろ！

translation.en: We've been on a little journey.
translation.ja: 僕たちは旅をした

translation.en: It wasn't a trip.
translation.ja: 旅行ではない

translation.en: A trip is predictable. A trip is boring.
translation.ja: 旅行は先が見えて退屈だ

translation.en: A journey has all kinds of discoveries, doesn't it?
translation.ja: 旅には 多くの発見があるだろう？

translation.en: Did you discover some new friends?
translation.ja: 新たな友を発見した？

translation.en: Did you discover some new feelings?
translation.ja: 新たな感情を発見した？

translation.en: Did you discover a new you?
translation.ja: 新しい自分を発見しただろう

translation.en: So, just for a moment,
translation.ja: 考えてみてくれ

translation.en: think about if you go to a great concert, what are you looking to feel?
translation.ja: いいコンサートに行って 何を求める？

translation.en: Fully alive, isn't it?
translation.ja: 生きてる実感だろ？

translation.en: Here, you were the concert.
translation.ja: 君たち自身が コンサートだった

translation.en: The concert was a family of people from 71 countries
translation.ja: 君たち自身が コンサートだった 71の国から来た みんなが―

translation.en: who came together to create music, magic, a transformation.
translation.ja: 音楽や奇跡や 変革を生み出した

translation.en: We brought our desire, our hunger, our love, our caring,
translation.ja: 欲求 飢え 愛 思いやりを 持って集まり―

translation.en: and we left our fear, our limitations, our frustration and our fucking past behind.
translation.ja: 恐れ 限界 不満 そして過去を置いて帰るんだ

translation.en: That's what we did here, ladies and gentlemen.
translation.ja: それが このセミナーだ

translation.en: It's been a privilege to serve you.
translation.ja: 役に立てて光栄だ

translation.en: We've laughed, we've cried, we've broken through.
translation.ja: 共に笑い 泣き 壁を打ち破った

translation.en: It was a blind date with destiny. How did she turn out, that date, for you?
translation.ja: “デート･ウィズ･ デスティニー”の成果は？

translation.en: Until we meet again, hopefully soon,
translation.ja: 近い将来 また会おう

translation.en: make your life a masterpiece, my dear friends. God bless you.
translation.ja: 最高の人生を作り出してくれ 神の恵みを！

translation.en: This whole week here and Date With Destiny
translation.ja: セミナーのおかげで 確信が持てました

translation.en: was just a confirmation that by expressing myself
translation.ja: セミナーのおかげで 確信が持てました 批判を恐れず 心を開いて伝えれば―

translation.en: and just not being afraid to be judged or, you know, to let that out,
translation.ja: 批判を恐れず 心を開いて伝えれば― 多くの人の心に届くと 分かったんです

translation.en: it touched so many people.
translation.ja: 多くの人の心に届くと 分かったんです

translation.en: So, that's what I wanna do for the rest of my life, and I don't wanna have fear.
translation.ja: だから私は 恐れずに生きていきます

translation.en: I wanna let that shine. And so I'm excited about that.
translation.ja: ずっと輝いていたい ワクワクするわ

translation.en: It meant a lot to me, the support of other people.
translation.ja: 多くの人に支えてもらい―

translation.en: There was a point when I felt, uh,
translation.ja: 心から感じました

translation.en: Yeah, I can trust. I'm in the right place.
translation.ja: ここに来てよかったって

translation.en: Everybody wants to know what happened after the call.
translation.ja: 電話のあとを みんな知りたがる

translation.en: I feel like I came in here and I had the weight of the world with me,
translation.ja: 私はここへ 重い荷物を背負って来たの

translation.en: and I feel like I set it down and I don't wanna pick it back up.
translation.ja: 下ろしたから 持ち上げたくない

translation.en: Pretty much after I contacted my dad, I was able to stay in contact with him.
translation.ja: あれ以来 パパとはずっと― 連絡を取り合ってます

translation.en: We've been texting and talking to each other every day.
translation.ja: 毎日メールや電話で

translation.en: I think everything in my life will just be a lot better. I'll see my dad a lot more.
translation.ja: これからは いい方向へ 向かうと思います

translation.en: I definitely want him to be a big part of my life again.
translation.ja: もっとパパと過ごしたいです

translation.en: Knowing that she's got my back now,
translation.ja: 僕が彼女を守れば―

translation.en: we can push forward and conquer our dreams, and it's just amazing.
translation.ja: 僕たちは前に進み 夢を実現できる

translation.en: I mean, it makes me so happy
translation.ja: すごく幸せ

translation.en: because now I get to choose the stuff that makes me light up.
translation.ja: 自分を輝かせるものが 選べるから

translation.en: The idea that I can start a chain reaction of transformation
translation.ja: 僕は変革の 連鎖反応を起こすんだ

translation.en: where people-- each one teach one.
translation.ja: 参加者それぞれが―

translation.en: You know, I can teach them and they go teach someone else.
translation.ja: 僕が教えたことを 人に伝える

translation.en: When I think about the families who were touched by this week,
translation.ja: 影響を受けた人が いると聞くと―

translation.en: when I think about the businesses and employees,
translation.ja: 影響を受けた人が いると聞くと― 本当にやって よかったと思う

translation.en: that makes the whole thing worthwhile.
translation.ja: 本当にやって よかったと思う

translation.en: What do you hope that this film will capture?
translation.ja: この作品に望むことは？

translation.en: My hope is that maybe somebody will watch this film and say, Oh, wow.
translation.ja: 変わっていく人たちを 見た観客に―

translation.en: It was really beautiful to watch these people transform.
translation.ja: 変わっていく人たちを 見た観客に― 変革はすばらしいと 思ってほしい

translation.en: Just watch it for that,
translation.ja: 変革はすばらしいと 思ってほしい

translation.en: and maybe that'll make them think about what's possible for themselves.
translation.ja: 自分にもできると 思ってほしい

translation.en: What about giving people a better understanding of who Tony Robbins is?
translation.ja: アンソニー･ロビンズを もっと知ってほしい？

translation.en: I don't know that many people give a shit.
translation.ja: 誰も興味ないだろう

translation.en: Honestly, if that's what your film's success is based on, I think you're in trouble.
translation.ja: それを目的に 作品を撮ってるなら―

translation.en: I think it's gotta be based on something bigger than that.
translation.ja: 考え直した方がいい

translation.en: I think it's gotta be based on what makes human beings fulfilled,
translation.ja: 人は何に満たされるのか 何に生かされ 何が変化をもたらすのか

translation.en: what makes them alive, what makes them hungry, what makes them change.
translation.ja: 何に生かされ 何が変化をもたらすのか

translation.en: You know, we all know that change can happen in a moment, but we're afraid it won't last.
translation.ja: 変化を起こしたら どう持続させるのか

translation.en: How is it that people can make lasting changes in minutes?
translation.ja: その変化が なぜ瞬時に起こせるのか

translation.en: What makes that possible, and is it really real?
translation.ja: その変化が なぜ瞬時に起こせるのか それは真実なのか

translation.en: And can I taste it and feel it, and could I experience it myself?
translation.ja: 触ったり味わったり できるのか

translation.en: I think that's a hell of a lot more interesting than, you know, Tony Robbins.
translation.ja: それを知る方が よっぽど面白い
